title: The Hideaway
typeOfFood: Lacto, Take-out, Bakery, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe on the main road through Urmston. Offers a few marked vegetarian and vegan items. There is a vegan breakfast, veggie sandwich fillings and jacket potato toppings, sometimes soups and specials labelled on the board. With notice, will offer a vegan afternoon tea with 3 kinds of sandwiches, 2 scones per person, and 3 kinds of cak, complete with vegan spread instead of butter and soya instead of dairy milk.
